job_title: Engineer, Metrology & Real Time Defects Analysis
job_description:
• Set up tool qualification criteria and implement monitoring through Statistical Process Control (SPC) charts.
• Interest in and knowledge of the semiconductor industry and Micron is preferred.
• Demonstrated leadership and a track record of impact are highly desirable Bachelor’s or advanced degree in Engineering or Science is required Internship or experience in the semiconductor industry is a plus Strong analytical, logical, and critical thinking skills Candidates with relevant experience is preferred.
• Support Fab through data analysis, providing knowledgeable summations of results and recommendations on how to proceed with process changes, equipment availability improvements and cost reduction work.
• Develop and run projects crafted to enhance inline detection, improve efficiency, reduce cost, reduce tool measurement variability and improve machine availability.

• Interest in and knowledge of the semiconductor industry and Micron is preferred Demonstrated leadership and a track record of impact are highly desirable Bachelor’s or advanced degree in Engineering or Science is required Internship or experience in the semiconductor industry is a plus Strong analytical, logical, and critical thinking skills Less than 2 years.
• Knowledge of Statistical Process Control (SPC), Design of Experiment, Engineering Statistical data analysis would be advantageous.
